thread.title: Facebook won't stick to strict EU privacy laws globally

title: Facebook won't stick to strict EU privacy laws globally
text:
Facebook won't stick to strict EU privacy laws globally 1:48am BST - 01:50 
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said on Tuesday the social network had no immediate plans to apply a strict new European Union law on data privacy in its entirety to the rest of the world, as the company reels from a scandal over its handling of personal information of millions of its users.   
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said on Tuesday the social network had no immediate plans to apply a strict new European Union law on data privacy in its entirety to the rest of the world, as the company reels from a scandal over its handling of personal information of millions of its users.  //reut.rs/2H63GLG
